“Yeah.” The two of you take half from each column. “Nothing out of the ordinary here.”

“I figure, since we've got all this extra stuff to deal with?” Aelriss asks. “We probably deserve it.”

“Deserve what, now?” You ask. “Some extra crafting materials?”

“Yeah, those.” She nods. “Alright, time to catch up?”

> Head in the direction of the fighting and join the party.
> Scout out Kjorikos and attempt an ambush.
> Find a way to get him going after the two of you instead.
> Write-in.
